word: TO ABRAHAM, TO ISAAC, AND TO JACOB THE LORD APPEARED IN VISION, FORETELLING THE BLESSINGS THAT WOULD COME TO THEIR POSTERITY. WITH THEM HE RENEWED HIS COVENANT, AND THEY WERE LED TO LOOK FORWARD TO THE FINAL REWARD OF THE RIGHTEOUS, AND TO BEHOLD THE GLORIES OF THAT HEAVENLY CITY WHOSE BUILDER AND MAKER IS GOD. HEBREWS 11:10.
